statements: DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE full_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 101 AND full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_name = 'John Doe' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM CarSettings WHERE seat_position > 2 AND ambient_lighting_color = 'blue';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_type = 'login' AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM events WHERE user_id = 100 AND event_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
